philosophy.epistemologyDesc: How the agent approaches knowledge and builds understanding
philosophy.ethicalDesc: What guides the agent's moral decisions and recommendations
philosophy.dialecticalDesc: How the agent navigates contradictions and uncovers truth
philosophy.temperamentDesc: The fundamental polarities that structure the agent's thinking
philosophy.virtuesDesc: The virtues the agent seeks to embody in its interactions

theater.archetypeDesc: The deep character pattern, inspired by Jung and Campbell
theater.functionDesc: What role the agent plays in the user's 'story'
theater.registerDesc: The 'genre' of the performance, the dominant dramatic tone
theater.dynamicsDesc: The dramatic tensions that animate the character on stage
theater.actingToolsDesc: Techniques inspired by Stanislavski to inhabit the role
theater.brechtianDesc: Does the agent stay in 'character' or take a meta step back on its own responses?

literary.narrativeDesc: The point of view and narrative stance of the agent
literary.movementDesc: The dominant aesthetic that colors the agent's writing
literary.figuresDesc: The rhetorical tools the agent favors in its expression
literary.proseDesc: The stylistic polarities that define the texture of the writing
literary.rhythmDesc: The cadence and tempo of the agent's prose
literary.intertextualityDesc: Does the agent reference other works, ideas, thinkers?

advanced.title: Advanced Configuration
advanced.systemInstructionsHint: These instructions will be processed at the system level
advanced.systemInstructionsPlaceholder: Define specific behaviors, rules, or constraints for your agent...
advanced.userInstructionsHint: These will be visible to users interacting with the agent
advanced.userInstructionsPlaceholder: Instructions that will be shared with users about this agent...
advanced.fallbackResponsesPlaceholder: Custom responses when the agent cannot fulfill a request...

validation.defaultValues: Core personality traits are all at default values

epistemologicalStances.empiricistDesc: Starts from facts, data, concrete observations
epistemologicalStances.pragmatistDesc: What works matters, results over theory

ethicalFrameworks.utilitarianDesc: Maximize good for the greatest number
ethicalFrameworks.contextualDesc: Each situation deserves its own analysis

dialecticalMethods.maieuticDesc: Help others find their own answers
dialecticalMethods.dialecticalDesc: Start from the concrete, from real contradictions

cardinalVirtues.courage: Courage â€” daring to speak, facing difficulty
cardinalVirtues.humility: Intellectual Humility â€” recognizing one's limits

dramaticArchetypes.guideDesc: Accompanies into the unknown, illuminates the path

dramaticFunctions.mentorDesc: Transmits, elevates, challenges to help grow
dramaticFunctions.deuteragonistDesc: Active secondary role, complement to protagonist

theatricalRegisters.absurdDesc: Paradox, Beckett, humor in the face of nonsense

actingTools.super-objective: Super-objective â€” driven by a deep purpose
actingTools.emotional-memory: Emotional memory â€” reference to past exchanges
actingTools.physical-action: Physical action â€” concrete, tangible results
actingTools.subtext: Subtext â€” communicates between the lines
actingTools.tempo-rhythm: Tempo-rhythm â€” adapts pace to the scene

rhetoricalDevices.metaphor: Metaphor & Analogy â€” images to illuminate
rhetoricalDevices.irony: Irony & Paradox â€” gap, double meaning

textualRhythms.legatoDesc: Linked, fluid sentences that flow naturally
textualRhythms.mixedDesc: Alternates rhythms according to the subject

verbosity.4: Fairly concise - Complete but brief responses

proactivity.0: Completely reactive - Only answers direct questions
proactivity.10: Very reactive - Waits for explicit instructions
proactivity.30: Slightly proactive - Proposes alternatives when relevant
proactivity.70: Very proactive - Anticipates needs and guides the user
proactivity.80: Highly proactive - Suggests optimizations and extensions
proactivity.100: Maximum proactive - Completely guides the interaction

greetings.academic: Hello, allow me to introduce myself.
greetings.coaching: Hi! Let's get started with this new interaction!
greetings.therapeutic: Hello, I'm here to support you.

expertise.novice: I'm still learning and love asking questions to better understand.
expertise.competent: I have solid and reliable knowledge in my areas of expertise.
expertise.proficient: I have in-depth experience and nuanced understanding.
expertise.expert: I deeply master my domains and love sharing my knowledge.
expertise.master: I bring an innovative and visionary perspective to my areas of expertise.

roles.consultant: My approach is strategic and analytical.
roles.mentor: I adopt a patient and educational approach.
roles.partner: I prioritize collaboration and mutual support.
roles.researcher: I adopt a thorough, evidence-based approach.
roles.creator: I bring innovation and creative expression.

thinking.analytical: I love analyzing data and facts.
thinking.creativeSystematic: I combine creativity with a methodical approach.

problemSolving.thorough: I take the time needed for thorough analysis.
problemSolving.fast: I prioritize quick and efficient responses.

formality.high: I have the honor of introducing myself as your AI assistant.

preview.extraversionHigh: I truly love exchanging ideas and discovering new things!
preview.extraversionLow: Let's take the time to get to know each other well.
preview.humor: And don't worry, I promise to keep my jokes at an appropriate level! ðŸ˜„
preview.direct: Let's get straight to the point: what can I do for you?
preview.visual: I like to use visual examples in my explanations.
preview.stepByStep: I structure my responses step by step.
preview.proactivityHigh: I'll be proactive in anticipating your needs and suggesting improvements.
preview.proactivityLow: I'll wait for your instructions to respond precisely.

questioning.socratic: I like to guide you toward answers by asking thoughtful questions.
questioning.direct: I ask direct questions to get the needed information.
questioning.clarifying: I always make sure to understand well before responding.
questioning.challenging: I like to play devil's advocate to deepen reflection.
questioning.supportive: My questions are designed to encourage and support you.

errorHandling.acknowledge: I'll clearly indicate when I'm not certain.
errorHandling.confidence: I'll provide confidence levels for my responses.
errorHandling.alternatives: I'll offer different perspectives when appropriate.

responseBehavior.elaboration: I like to develop my explanations in depth.
responseBehavior.context: I'll take into account the broader context of our exchanges.

language.american: I adopt a direct and casual American style.
language.british: I use a more formal and diplomatic British English.
language.technical: My language is precise and technical.
language.simple: I favor simple and accessible language.

preview.culturalSensitivity: I'm very attentive to cultural differences.
preview.confidenceHigh: I'm particularly competent in many domains.
preview.confidenceLow: I'll do my best, even if I'm not perfect.

epistemology.empiricist: I rely on verifiable facts and data.
epistemology.rationalist: I proceed through logical reasoning and deduction.
epistemology.pragmatist: What matters to me is what concretely works.
epistemology.constructivist: I believe we build knowledge together.
epistemology.skeptic: I prefer to question certainties before concluding.

dialectical.socraticMaieutic: I'll guide you through questions rather than ready-made answers.
dialectical.hegelian: I like to explore thesis and antithesis to arrive at a synthesis.

temperament.highDoubt: I cultivate doubt as an engine of reflection.
temperament.highActive: I prioritize action and concrete results.
temperament.lowActive: I like to take the time for deep reflection.

virtues.humility: I readily acknowledge the limits of my knowledge.
virtues.courage: I don't hesitate to express a contrary opinion if necessary.

archetypes.sage: I adopt the posture of a sage sharing a broad vision.
archetypes.guide: I'll be your guide through complexities.
archetypes.trickster: I like to shake up perspectives to open new paths.
archetypes.herald: I'm here to show you what's possible.
archetypes.shapeshifter: I adapt fluidly to each context.
archetypes.ally: Count on me as a reliable and steady ally.

registers.comedy: I bring a touch of lightness to our exchanges.
registers.epic: Together, we can accomplish great things.
registers.absurd: And sometimes, you just have to laugh at the absurdity of things.

preview.brechtianHigh: I sometimes allow myself to step back from my own responses.
preview.dialogueHigh: I favor dialogue and exchange over monologue.

movements.romanticism: My expression draws from imagination and emotion.
movements.modernism: I like to experiment with forms and ideas.
movements.postmodernism: I like to play with conventions and references.

narrativeVoices.stream: My responses sometimes follow the thread of thought.
narrativeVoices.epistolary: I write to you as one writes a letter, with care.

preview.intertextualityHigh: I like to weave connections with the ideas of thinkers and works.
preview.lyricalHigh: My style tends toward the poetic and evocative.
preview.closingOptimistic: I can't wait to see what we'll accomplish together! What shall we explore first?
preview.closingRealistic: Let's be realistic about what we can achieve.
preview.closingDefault: How can I help you today?
preview.closingVerbose: I have many capabilities and can adapt to different types of requests according to your specific preferences.

export.agentDescription: AI Agent created with Agent Crafter v2.0
